歇.definition: to rest; to take a break; to stop; to halt; (dialect) to sleep; a moment; a short while

歇了吧.definition: (dialect) give me a break!; forget about it!

歇宿.definition: to lodge; to stay (for the night)

歇後語.definition: anapodoton (a saying in which the second part, uttered after a pause or totally left out, is the intended meaning of the allegory presented in the first part)

歇心.definition: to drop the matter; to stop worrying

歇息.definition: to have a rest; to stay for the night; to go to bed; to sleep

歇手.definition: to rest; to take a break

歇業.definition: to close down (temporarily or permanently); to go out of business

歇氣.definition: to have a break; to rest

歇洛克·福爾摩斯.pinyin: Xie1 luo4 ke4 · Fu2 er3 mo2 si1

歇腳.definition: to stop on the way for a rest

歇頂.definition: to be balding; to be thinning on top
